ConvertInstance.title: ConvertInstance
ConvertInstance.summary: Changes the billing method of a workspace from pay-as-you-go to subscription.

ConvertPrepayInstance.title: ConvertPrepayInstance
ConvertPrepayInstance.summary: Changes the billing method of a workspace from subscription to pay-as-you-go.

CreateInstance.title: CreateInstance
CreateInstance.summary: Creates a subscription workspace or a pay-as-you-go workspace of Realtime Compute for Apache Flink.

CreateNamespace.title: CreateNamespace
CreateNamespace.summary: Creates a namespace in a Realtime Compute for Apache Flink workspace.

DeleteInstance.title: DeleteInstance
DeleteInstance.summary: Deletes a pay-as-you-go workspace of Realtime Compute for Apache Flink.

DescribeInstances.title: DescribeInstances
DescribeInstances.summary: Queries the details of one or more Realtime Compute for Apache Flink workspaces.

DescribeNamespaces.title: DescribeNamespaces
DescribeNamespaces.summary: Queries the information about a namespace that belongs to a workspace.

DescribeSupportedRegions.title: DescribeSupportedRegions
DescribeSupportedRegions.summary: Queries the regions that are available in which Realtime Compute for Apache Flink is supported.

DescribeSupportedZones.title: DescribeSupportedZones
DescribeSupportedZones.summary: Obtains the zones that are supported by Realtime Compute for Apache Flink.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags of specified resources. You can query the key of a tag by tag value, or query the value of a tag by tag key. You can also obtain information about all tags that you use in a workspace in the console of fully managed Flink.

ModifyInstanceSpec.title: ModifyInstanceSpec
ModifyInstanceSpec.summary: Scale in or out a workspace to reconfigure resources for the workspace.

ModifyPrepayInstanceSpec.title: ModifyPrepayInstanceSpec
ModifyPrepayInstanceSpec.summary: Modifies the configuration of the computing resources of a subscription fully managed Flink workspace. If the number of computing resources after the modification is less than the current number of computing resources, the scale-in operation is performed. If the number of computing resources after the modification is larger than the current number of computing resources, the scale-out operation is performed.

ModifyPrepayNamespaceSpec.title: ModifyPrepayNamespaceSpec
ModifyPrepayNamespaceSpec.summary: Modifies the resource configurations of a namespace in a subscription workspace.

QueryConvertInstancePrice.title: QueryConvertInstancePrice
QueryConvertInstancePrice.summary: Queries the fee of switching the billing method of a workspace from pay-as-you-go to subscription.

QueryConvertPrepayInstancePrice.title: QueryConvertPrepayInstancePrice
QueryConvertPrepayInstancePrice.summary: Obtains the estimated refund after the billing method of your Realtime Compute for Apache Flink workspace is changed from subscription to pay-as-you-go. After you change the billing method of your workspace to pay-as-you-go, bills are generated on an hourly basis.

QueryCreateInstancePrice.title: QueryCreateInstancePrice
QueryCreateInstancePrice.summary: Queries the fee of creating a workspace.

QueryModifyInstancePrice.title: QueryModifyInstancePrice
QueryModifyInstancePrice.summary: Queries the fee of modifying the resource configuration of a workspace.

QueryRenewInstancePrice.title: QueryRenewInstancePrice
QueryRenewInstancePrice.summary: Queries the fee of renewing a subscription workspace.

RenewInstance.title: RenewInstance
RenewInstance.summary: Renews a subscription workspace of Realtime Compute for Apache Flink.
